description: Build a simple todo application with Next.js demonstrating the complete blueprint workflow

tasks.title: Setup Next.js project structure
tasks.description:
Configure Next.js project with proper organization and tooling.

## Tasks
- Create component directories (components/, utils/, types/)
- Configure ESLint and Prettier
- Setup TypeScript strict mode
- Add global styles
- Configure path aliases (@/*)
acceptanceCriteria: All directories created with proper structure

tasks.title: Create Todo data model and utilities
tasks.description:
Define Todo interface and create utility functions for data management.

## Implementation
- Define Todo interface (id, text, completed, createdAt)
- Create sample todo data
- Add utility functions (addTodo, deleteTodo, toggleTodo)
- Setup local storage helpers
acceptanceCriteria: Unit tests pass for all utilities

tasks.title: Build Todo list UI components
tasks.description:
Create reusable components for displaying todo items and the todo list.

## Components
- TodoList component (displays list of todos)
- TodoItem component (individual todo with checkbox)
- EmptyState component (when no todos)
- Add CSS modules for styling

tasks.title: Add create and delete Todo functionality
tasks.description:
Implement CRUD operations for creating and deleting todos.

## Features
- TodoForm component with input field
- Submit handler for creating todos
- Delete button on each TodoItem
- Optimistic UI updates
- Form validation (no empty todos)

tasks.title: Add Todo filtering (all/active/completed)
tasks.description:
Implement filter functionality to view todos by completion status.

## Implementation
- Create FilterButtons component
- Add filter state (all, active, completed)
- Filter logic based on selected filter
- Persist selected filter
- Show active filter count
acceptanceCriteria: Filter state persists across page refreshes
Clear visual indication of active filter
